attributes.action: OR OUR BRAVE TROOPS TO HAVE A SAY AND A VOTE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
while our troops are in Afghanistan  fighting they haven't got a say or vote for Britain . They  can put up polling stations for Iraq's to vote please join so OUR TROOPS CAN HAVE A RIGHT TO VOTE 
Let out troops out in Afghanistan vote

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
